I.name: Center of the Universe
I.cooldown: {{tt|1|The time within which the same star cannot damage the same target twice.}}
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' is constantly orbited by three ''Stars'', each doing a full circumference in {{fd|5.25}} seconds, and beyond them exists an {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} affecting his damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]].

Each ''Star'' deals {{as|{{pp|10+2*x for 5; then + 3*x for 2; then + 6*x for 4; then + 10*x|formula=10 + 2 per level until lvl 5, then + 3 until lvl 7, then + 6 per level until lvl 11, then + 10 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|type = [[File:Celestial Expansion.png|20px|border|link=]] ''Celestial Expansion's'' Rank|5 to 25 for 5}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy {{tip|minions}} that have less than {{sti|health|{{as|25 health}}}}, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging Champion ability.
Each Star deals 10+2*x for 5; then + 3*x for 2; then + 6*x for 4; then + 10*x − undefined (based on level) (+ 5 − 25 for 5 (based on level) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy minions that have less than 25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
I.notes:
* The ''Stars'' orbit counterclockwise around '''Aurelion Sol'''.
* '''Aurelion Sol's''' ''Stars'' have independent {{tip|sight|vision}} hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a {{tip|brush}}, and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden.
* An individual ''Star'' must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again. 
* In the event that an enemy orbits around '''Aurelion Sol''' at the same rate as his ''Stars'' without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.

Q1.name: Starsurge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' fires a star in the target direction that expands as long as it remains within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, which grants him {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while active. If he moves faster than the star, the speed of the star will increase to keep up.
''Starsurge'' can be recast after {{fd|0.25}} seconds while the star is active, and does so automatically when the star travels beyond the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}.

{{sbc|Recast:}} The star detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for a duration, which is increased by {{pp|key=%|type=time traveled|0;25;50;75;100 to 300 for 9|0;0.1875;0.375;0.5625;0.75 to 5}}.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Aurelion Sol fires a star in the target direction that expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit, which grants him 20% bonus movement speed while active. If he moves faster than the star, the speed of the star will increase to keep up.
Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the star is active, and does so automatically when the star travels beyond the Outer Limit.
Recast: The star detonates, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0;0.1875;0.375;0.5625;0.75 to 5 ‒ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}}}{{st|Minimum Stun Duration|{{ap|0.55 to 0.75}}|Maximum Stun Duration|{{ap|2.2 to 3}}}}
Q1.notes:
*The initial cast count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually does not.
* So long as '''Aurelion Sol''' manages to keep ''Starsurge'' within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, it will continue to expand until detonated or out of range.
* ''Starsurge's'' size grows by {{fd|36.67}} units per second.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 65% AP)
  • Minimum Stun Duration:
  • Maximum Stun Duration:

W1.name: Celestial Expansion
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} The {{ais|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|}} '''base''' damage is increased.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' expands his ''{{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars}}'' to the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their '''total''' damage by 40%.
''Celestial Expansion'' can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting ''{{ai|Comet of Legend|Aurelion Sol}}''.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' commands the stars to retract, granting him {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}} that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
W1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: The Aurelion Sol's Center of the Universe base damage is increased.
Active: Aurelion Sol expands his Aurelion Sol's Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.
Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting Aurelion Sol's Comet of Legend.
Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
W1.notes:
* The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** Deactivating the ability manually does not.

effects.str: • Total Damage: (10+2*x)*1.4 for 5; then + 3*1.4*x for 2; then + 6*1.4*x for 4; then + 10*1.4*x − undefined (based on level) (+ ) (+ % AP)

st_slices: (10+2*x)*1.4 for 5; then + 3*1.4*x for 2; then + 6*1.4*x for 4; then + 10*1.4*x − undefined (based on level) (+ ) (+ % AP)

E1.name: Comet of Legend
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' pulls in his ''{{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars}}'' and takes flight, {{tip|dash|dashing}} in the target direction. While in flight, '''Aurelion Sol''' has {{tip|unobstructed vision}} and sets his {{as|movement speed}} to a {{tt|static amount|Cannot be modified}}.
'''''Aurelion Sol''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during the dash.''
''Comet of Legend'' can be recast after {{fd|1.5}} seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|turrets}}.

If damage is taken while ''Comet of Legend'' is not active, it is placed on a 4-second {{sti|{{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}}}}. '''Aurelion Sol''' will be {{tip|sight|revealed}} while he is inside [[terrain]] and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his Aurelion Sol's Stars and takes flight, dashing in the target direction. While in flight, Aurelion Sol has unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.
Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy champions or turrets.
Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.
If damage is taken while Comet of Legend is not active, it is placed on a 4-second static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.
E1.notes:
[[File:Comet_of_Legend_max_range_indicator.png|150px|thumb|right|Max range indicator]]
* The spot at which the flight will reach maximum range is highlighted to '''Aurelion Sol'''.
* The following table refers to interactions during ''Comet of Legend'':
{{ct|attack=Disabled for the first {{fd|1.5}} seconds, interrupts afterwards.|move=Disabled for the first {{fd|1.5}} seconds, interrupts afterwards.|cast={{ai|Starsurge|Aurelion Sol}} is usable. {{ai|Celestial Expansion|Aurelion Sol}} and {{ai|Voice of Light|Aurelion Sol}} are disabled.|items=true,,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,,interrupts,interrupts|spells=true, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts, false, true, interrupts|interrupts=death, root|damage=true}}

R.name: Voice of Light
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.125}} seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} to it, though not through terrain.
'''''Aurelion Sol''' {{tip|channel|channels}} over {{fd|0.3}} seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by any {{tip|crowd control}}.''
''{{ai|Celestial Expansion|Aurelion Sol}}'' can be cast during ''Voice of Light''.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path, slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit, stunning them for 0.125 seconds and knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.
Aurelion Sol channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be interrupted by any crowd control.
Aurelion Sol's Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.

• Magic Damage: (+ 70% AP)
